name: The Last Game
description:
Embark on a perilous journey in this addictive action roguelite adventure.

Fight fierce enemies

Discover 5 floors defended by 13 different bosses.

Become stronger

Discover more than 80 different items and find powerful synergies. Unlock the 7 different characters with their specific behavior.

Play with your friends

Play locally or remotely (with Remote Play Together). Up to 4 players can play in co-op and establish multiplayer-specific strategies.
You need to add controllers to be able to play in multiplayer mode (keyboard not supported in multiplayer).

Die often

But unlock starting items, revive stronger than ever, and discover the truth behind that game.
